alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 1:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Las Animas County through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trinidad, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Hoehne and Boncarbo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
